reasoning: Most common soft tissue sarcoma in adults, representing ~20% of cases. Estimated incidence ~0.4 per 100k based on SEER registry data from early 2000s.
source: Toro JR et al. (2006). Incidence patterns of soft tissue sarcomas, regardless of primary site, in the surveillance, epidemiology and end results program, 1978-2001. Int J Cancer. 119(12):2922-2930
